channel.title: Help me choose a source to start with
channel.description: ok guys , so I just finished my last project , which is RedMars ( 317 server ). I've made a total of 2 servers so far , and both of them are 317. But i'm bored with 317 its too easy. So i'm thinking of making a 508 server , cuz i want to raise my experience bar a little bit. So my question would be , is 508 harder than 317? And can you recommend me a good source and tutorial perhaps i could start with?

item.title: Help me choose a source to start with
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

i know why download section is there for , but every source is different , and i wanna know what source is the best for 508 starters

Read full topic
item.source: Help me choose a source to start with

item.title: Help me choose a source to start with
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Yes, I would imagine it’s harder.
To find a source start of by looking in downloads ection or use the search feature, it’s what it’s there for.

Read full topic
